question: The next number in the sequence 2, 8, 18, 32, 50, â€¦. is :
explanation:
The given sequence is based on the following pattern : 
$latex 2\\xrightarrow{+6}8\\xrightarrow{+10}18\\xrightarrow{+14}32\\xrightarrow{+18}50\\xrightarrow{+22}\\underline{72}&s=1$
Hence, 72 will be the next number in this sequence.
Option [B] is the right answer.
